<EFX_BUSINESS>
<A NAME="FIS_BUSINESS"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ITEM 1.&nbsp;&nbsp;BUSINESS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CAUTIONARY
</FONT>
<A NAME="SGMA-20160430X10K_HTM_BUSINESS">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	NOTE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In addition to historical financial information, this discussion of the business of SigmaTron International, Inc. (&#x201C;SigmaTron&#x201D;), its wholly-owned subsidiaries Standard Components de Mexico S.A., AbleMex, S.A. de C.V., Digital Appliance Controls de Mexico, S.A. de C.V., Spitfire Controls (Vietnam) Co. Ltd., Spitfire Controls (Cayman) Co. Ltd., wholly-owned foreign enterprises Wujiang SigmaTron Electronics Co., Ltd. and SigmaTron Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. (collectively, &#x201C;SigmaTron China&#x201D;) and international procurement office SigmaTron Taiwan branch (collectively, the &#x201C;Company&#x201D;) and other Items in th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	is Annual Report on Form 10-K
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	contain forward-looking statements concerning the Company&#x2019;s business or results of operations.&nbsp;&nbsp;Words such as &#x201C;continue,&#x201D; &#x201C;anticipate,&#x201D; &#x201C;will,&#x201D; &#x201C;expect,&#x201D; &#x201C;believe,&#x201D; &#x201C;plan,&#x201D; and similar expressions identify forward-looking statements.&nbsp;&nbsp;These forward-looking statements are based on the current expectations of the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;Because these forward-looking statements involve risks and uncertainties, the Company&#x2019;s plans, actions and actual results could differ materially.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such statements should be evaluated in the context of the risks and uncertainties inherent in the Company&#x2019;s business including, but not necessarily limited to, the Company&#x2019;s continued dependence on certain significant customers; the continued market acceptance of products and services offered by the Company and its customers; pricing pressures from the Company&#x2019;s customers, suppliers and the market; the activities of competitors, some of which may have greater financial or other resources than the Company; the variability of our operating results; the results of long-lived assets and goodwill impairment testing; the variability of our customers&#x2019; requirements; the availability and cost of necessary components and materials; the ability of the Company and our customers to keep current with technological changes within our industries; regulatory compliance, including conflict minerals; the continued availability and sufficiency of our credit arrangements; changes in U.S., Mexican, Chinese, Vietnamese or Taiwanese regulations affecting the Company&#x2019;s business; the turmoil in the global economy and financial markets; the stability of the U.S., Mexican, Chinese, Vietnamese and Taiwanese economic, labor and political systems and conditions; currency exchange fluctuations; and the ability of the Company to manage its growth.&nbsp;&nbsp;These and other factors which may affect the Company&#x2019;s future business and results of operations are identified throughout the Company&#x2019;s Annual Report on Form 10-K, and as risk factors, and may be detailed from time to time in the Company&#x2019;s filings with the Securities and Exchange Commission.&nbsp;&nbsp;These statements speak as of the date of such filings, and the Company undertakes no obligation to update such statements in light of future events or otherwise unless otherwise required by law.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Overview
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	SigmaTron is a Delaware corporation, which was organized on November 16, 1993, and commenced operations when it became the successor to all of the assets and liabilities of SigmaTron L.P., an Illinois limited partnership, through a reorganization on February 8, 1994.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company operates in one business segment as an independent provider of electronic manufacturing services (&#x201C;EMS&#x201D;), which includes printed circuit board assemblies and completely assembled (box-build) electronic products.&nbsp;&nbsp;In connection with the production of assembled products, the Company also provides services to its customers, including (1) automatic and manual assembly and testing of products; (2) material sourcing and procurement; (3) manufacturing and test engineering support; (4) design services; (5) warehousing and distribution services; and (6) assistance in obtaining product approval from governmental and other regulatory bodies.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company provides these manufacturing services through an international network of facilities located in the United States, Mexico, China, Vietnam and Taiwan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company provides manufacturing and assembly services ranging from the assembly of individual components to the assembly and testing of box-build electronic products.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company has the ability to produce assemblies requiring mechanical as well as electronic capabilities.&nbsp;&nbsp;The products assembled by the
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage5"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Company are then incorporated into finished products sold in various industries, particularly appliance, consumer electronics, gaming, fitness, industrial electronics, medical/life sciences, semiconductor and telecommunications.&nbsp;&nbsp;In some instances the Company manufactures the completed finished product for its customers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company operates manufacturing facilities in Elk Grove Village, Illinois
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	United States of America (&#x201C;U.S.&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	; Union City, California
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	U.S.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	; Acuna, Chihuahua and Tijuana, Mexico; Suzhou, China; and Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, the Company maintains
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	an International Procurement Office (IPO) in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Taipei, Taiwan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company also provides design services in Elgin, Illinois.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In an effort to facilitate the growth of our China operation, the Company established a new Chinese entity in October 2011 that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	allow
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the Company to provide services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	competitively
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to the domestic market in China
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and in fiscal year 2015 expanded the Company&#x2019;s manufacturing facility.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company expects the China operation to continue to grow despite increasing costs of operation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	international footprint
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	provides
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	our customers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	flexibility within
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to manufacture in China
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Mexico
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Vietnam or the U.S.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We believe this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	strategy
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	will continue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to serve the Company well as its customers continuously evaluate their supply chain
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	strategies.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Products and Services
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company provides a broad range of electronic and electromechanical manufacturing related outsourcing solutions for its customers.&nbsp;&nbsp;These solutions incorporate the Company&#x2019;s knowledge and expertise in the EMS industry to provide its customers with advanced manufacturing technologies, complete supply chain management, responsive and flexible customer service, as well as product design, test and engineering support.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company&#x2019;s EMS solutions are available from inception of product concept through the ultimate delivery of a finished product.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such technologies and services include the following:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Manufacturing and Testing Services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;The Company&#x2019;s core business is the assembly and testing of all types of electronic printed circuit board assemblies (&#x201C;PCBA&#x201D;) and often incorporating these PCBAs into electronic modules used in all types of devices and products that depend on electronics for their operation.&nbsp;&nbsp;This assembly work utilizes state of the art manufacturing and test equipment to deliver highly reliable products to the Company&#x2019;s customers.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company supports new product introduction (&#x201C;NPI&#x201D;), low volume / high mix as well as high volume/ low mix assembly work at all levels of complexity.&nbsp;&nbsp;Assembly services include pin-through-hole (&#x201C;PTH&#x201D;) components, surface mount (&#x201C;SMT&#x201D;) components, including ball grid array (&#x201C;BGA&#x201D;), part-on-part components, conformal coating, parylene coating and others.&nbsp;&nbsp;Test services include and are not limited to, in-circuit, automated optical inspection (&#x201C;AOI&#x201D;), functional, burn-in, hi-pot and boundary scan.&nbsp;&nbsp;From simple component assembly through the most complicated industry testing, the Company offers virtually every service required to build electronic devices commercially available in the market today.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Design Serv
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ces:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	To compliment the manufacturing services it offers its customers, the Company also offers DFM, design for manufacturing and DFT, design for test review services to help customers ensure that the products they have designed are optimized for production and testing.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, through its Spitfire Control division, the Company offers complete product design services for a variety of industries and applications, including appliance controls.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Supply Chain Management:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;The Company provides complete supply chain management for the procurement of components needed to build customers&#x2019; products.&nbsp;&nbsp;This includes the procurement and management of all types of electronic components and related mechanical parts such as plastics and metals.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company&#x2019;s resources supporting this activity are provided both on a plant specific basis as well as globally through its IPO in Taipei, Taiwan.&nbsp;&nbsp;Each of its sites is linked together using the same Enterprise Resource Planning (&#x201C;ERP&#x201D;) system and custom IScore software tools with real-time on-line visibility for customer access.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company procures material from major manufacturers and distributors of electronic parts all over the world.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company relies on numerous third-party suppliers for components used in the Company&#x2019;s production process.&nbsp;&nbsp;Certain of these components are available only from single-sources or a limited number of suppliers.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, a customer&#x2019;s specifications may require the Company to obtain components from a
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage6"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	single-source or a small number of suppliers.&nbsp;&nbsp;The loss of any such suppliers could have a material impact on the Company&#x2019;s results of operations.&nbsp;&nbsp;Further, the Company could operate at a cost disadvantage compared to competitors who have greater direct buying power from suppliers.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company does not enter into long-term purchase agreements with major or single-source suppliers.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company believes that short-term purchase orders with its suppliers provides flexibility, given that the Company&#x2019;s orders are based on the changing needs of its customers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Warehousing and Distribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;The Company provides
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	both
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in-house and third party warehousing, shipping, and customs brokerage for border crossings as part of its service offering.&nbsp;&nbsp;This includes international shipping, drop shipments to the end customer, as well as, support of inventory optimization activities such as kanban and consignment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Green, Sustainability, and Social Responsible Initiatives:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;The Company supports initiatives that promote sustainability, green environment and social responsibility.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company requires its supply chain to meet all government imposed requirements in these areas and helps its customers in achieving effective compliance.&nbsp;&nbsp;Th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	include, but
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	not limited to, Restrictions of Hazardous Substances (&#x201C;RoHS&#x201D;), Restriction of Chemicals (&#x201C;Reach&#x201D;) and Conflict Minerals regulations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Manufacturing Location and Certifications:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	T
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	he Company&#x2019;s manufacturing and warehousing locations are&nbsp;&nbsp;strategically located to support our customers with&nbsp;&nbsp;locations in Elk Grove Village, Illinois U.S.; Union City, California U.S.; Acuna, Chihuahua and Tijuana, Mexico; Suzhou, China and Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company&#x2019;s ability to transition manufacturing to lower cost regions without jeopardizing flexibility and service, differentiates it from many competitors.&nbsp;&nbsp;Manufacturing certifications and registrations are location specific, and include ISO 9001:2008, ISO 14001:2004, Medical ISO 13485:2003, Aerospace AS9100C and International Traffic in Arms Regulations (&#x201C;ITAR&#x201D;) certifications.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Markets and Customers
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company&#x2019;s customers are in the appliance, gaming, industrial electronics, fitness, medical/life sciences, semiconductor, telecommunications and consumer electronics industries.&nbsp;&nbsp;As of April 30, 2016, the Company had approximately 125 active customers ranging from Fortune 500 companies to small, privately held enterprises.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The following table shows, for the periods indicated, the percentage of net sales to the principal end-user markets it serves.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">

	&#xFEFF;

	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;

<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage7"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	For the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fiscal year ended April 30, 2016, the Company&#x2019;s largest two customers, Electrolux and Whirlpool Inc., accounted for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	35
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.2% and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	respectively, of the Company&#x2019;s net sales.&nbsp;&nbsp;For the fiscal year ended April 30, 2015, Electrolux and Whirlpool Inc., accounted for 36.8% and 9.9%, respectively, of the Company&#x2019;s net sales.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	T
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	he Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	believes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	that Electrolux and Whirlpool will continue to account for a significant percentage of the Company&#x2019;s net sales, although the percentage of net sales may vary from period to period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sales and Marketing
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company markets its services through 9 independent manufacturers&#x2019; representative organizations that together currently employ 18 sales personnel in the United States and Canada.&nbsp;&nbsp;Independent manufacturers&#x2019; representatives organizations receive variable commissions based on orders received by the Company and are assigned specific accounts, not territories.&nbsp;&nbsp;Many of the members of the Company&#x2019;s senior management are actively involved in sales and marketing efforts, and the Company has 4 direct sales employees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;In addition, the Company markets itself through its website and tradeshows.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Mexico, Vietnam and China Operations
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company&#x2019;s wholly-owned subsidiary, Standard Components de Mexico, S.A, a Mexican corporation, is located in Acuna, Coahuila Mexico, a border town across the Rio Grande River from Del Rio, Texas, and is 155 miles west of San Antonio. Standard Components de Mexico, S.A. was incorporated and commenced operation in 1968 and had 838 employees at April 30, 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company&#x2019;s wholly-owned subsidiary, AbleMex S.A. de C.V., a Mexican corporation, is located in Tijuana, Baja California Mexico, a border town south of San Diego, California.&nbsp;&nbsp;AbleMex S.A. de C.V. was incorporated and commenced operations in 2000.&nbsp;&nbsp;The operation had 186 employees at April 30, 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company&#x2019;s wholly-owned subsidiary, Digital Appliance Controls de Mexico S.A., a Mexican corporation, operates in Chihuahua, Mexico, located approximately 235 miles from El Paso, Texas.&nbsp;&nbsp;Digital Appliance Controls de Mexico S.A. was incorporated and commenced operations in 1997.&nbsp;&nbsp;The operation had 474 employees at April 30, 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company believes that one of the key benefits to having operations in Mexico is its access to cost-effective labor resources while having geographic proximity to the United States.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company&#x2019;s wholly-owned foreign enterprise
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	s,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Wujiang SigmaTron Electronics Co., Ltd. and SigmaTron Electronic Technology Co., Ltd.,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	located in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Suzhou
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, China.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company has entered into an agreement with governmental authorities in the economic development zone of Wujiang, Jiangsu Province, Peoples Republic of China, pursuant to which the Company became the lessee of a parcel of land of approximately 100 Chinese acres.&nbsp;&nbsp;The term of the land lease is 50 years.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company built a manufacturing plant, office space and dormitories on this site during 2004.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In fiscal 2015, the China facility expanded and added 40,000 square feet in warehouse and manufacturing.&nbsp;&nbsp;The total square footage of the facility is 202,000 and has 487 employees as of April 30, 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;Both
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	SigmaTron China
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	entities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	operate at this site
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company&#x2019;s wholly-owned subsidiary, Spitfire Controls (Vietnam) Co. Ltd. is located in Amata Industrial Park, Bien Hoa City, Dong Nai Province, Vietnam, and is 18 miles east of Ho Chi Minh City.&nbsp;&nbsp;Spitfire Controls (Vietnam) Co. Ltd. was incorporated and commenced operation in 2005 and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	had
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	309 employees as of April 30, 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company provides funds for salaries, wages, overhead and capital expenditure items as necessary to operate its wholly-owned Mexican, Vietnam
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ese
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and Chinese subsidiaries and the Taiwan IPO.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company provides funding in U.S. dollars, which are exchanged for Pesos, Dong, Renminbi, and New Taiwan dollars
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;The fluctuation of currencies from time to time, without an equal or greater increase in inflation, could have a material impact on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the financial results of the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The impact of currency fluctuation for the fiscal year ended April 30, 2016 resulted in a net foreign currency
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	loss
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	59
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	compared to a net foreign currency gain of $40,000 in the prior year.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	year 2016,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	he Company paid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	approximately $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	52
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	foreign
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	subsidiaries
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company has not recorded U.S. income taxes on the undistributed earnings of the Company&#x2019;s foreign subsidiaries.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Since t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	he earnings of the foreign subsidiaries have been,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	will continue to be indefinitely reinvested, no deferred tax liability has been recorded.&nbsp;&nbsp;The cumulative amount of unremitted earnings for which U.S. income taxes have not been recorded is $12,588,000 as of April 30, 2016.&nbsp; The amount of U.S.
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	income taxes on these earnings is impractical to compute due to the complexities of the hypothetical calculation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During fiscal year 2015, the Company re
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	corded
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	tax expense of $643,708 related to the inability to realize the tax benefit recorded in fiscal year 2014 for potential foreign tax credits.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company&#x2019;s estimate of cumulative taxable income during the foreign tax credit carryforward period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	insufficient to support that the tax benefit from the foreign tax credit is more likely than not to be realized.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The consolidated financial statements as of April 30, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	include the accounts and transactions of SigmaTron, its wholly-owned subsidiaries
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, Standard Components de Mexico, S.A.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, AbleMex S.A. de C.V., Digital Appliance Controls de Mexico, S.A. de C.V., Spitfire Controls (Vietnam) Co. Ltd., Spitfire Controls (Cayman) Co. Ltd., wholly-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	owned foreign enterprise
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Wujiang
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	SigmaTron Electronics Co., Ltd. and SigmaTron Electronic Technology Co., Ltd.,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	international
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	procurement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	office,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	SigmaTron Taiwan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Branch
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	Company&#x2019;s foreign subsidiaries operations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the U.S. dollar.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;Intercompany transactions are eliminated in the consolidated financial statements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Competition
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The EMS industry is highly competitive and subject to rapid change.&nbsp;&nbsp;Furthermore, both large and small companies compete in the industry, and many have significantly greater financial resources, more extensive business experience and greater marketing and production capabilities than the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;The significant competitive factors in this industry include price, quality, service, timeliness, reliability, the ability to source raw components, and manufacturing and technological capabilities.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company believes it can
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	compete on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	all of these factors.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Consolidation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As a result of consolidation and other transactions involving competitors and other companies in the Company&#x2019;s markets, the Company occasionally reviews potential transactions relating to its business, products and technologies.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such transactions could include mergers, acquisitions, strategic alliances, joint ventures, licensing agreements, co-promotion agreements, financing arrangements or other types of transactions.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the future, the Company may choose to enter into these types of or other transactions at any time depending on available sources of financing, and such transactions could have a material impact on the Company&#x2019;s business, financial condition or operations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Governmental Regulations
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company&#x2019;s operations are subject to certain foreign, federal, state and local regulatory requirements relating to, among others, environmental, waste management, labor and health and safety matters.&nbsp; Management believes that the Company&#x2019;s business is operated in material compliance with all such regulations, including Restriction of Hazardous Substances (&#x201C;RoHS&#x201D;) and Registration, Evaluation, Authorizati
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	on and Restriction of Chemicals
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	REACH").&nbsp; RoHS prohibits the use of lead, mercury and certain other specified substances in electronics products
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	being sold into the Europe
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Union
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp; The Company has RoHS-dedicated manufacturing capabilities at all of its manufacturing operations.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	REACH&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	is a European Union Regulation enacted as of December 2006. &nbsp;The regulation imposes information reporting requirements on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	all
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	listed SVHCs (substances of very high concern)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	From time-to-time&nbsp;the Company's&nbsp;customers request REACH required information and certifications on the assemblies the Company manufactures for them.&nbsp; These requests require the Company to gather information from component suppliers to verify the presence and level of mass of any SVHCs greater than 0.1% in the assemblies the Company manufactures based on customer specifications.&nbsp; If any SVHCs are present at more than 0.1% of the mass of the item
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the specific concentration and mass of the SVHC must be reported to proper authorities by the Company's
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	customer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act of 2010 (the &#x201C;Dodd-Frank Act&#x201D;) introduced reporting requirements for verification of whether the Company directly (or indirectly through suppliers of components) is purchasing the minerals or metals gold, columbite-tantalite, cassiterite, wo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	lframite and their derivatives (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	tin, tungsten, and tantalum
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, that are being provided by sources in the conflict region of the
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage9"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Democratic Republic of Congo (&#x201C;DRC&#x201D;).&nbsp; On
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	May
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, the Company filed Form SD with the Securities and Exchange Commission stating the Company&#x2019;s supply chain remains DRC conflict undeterminable.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company&#x2019;s costs of compliance with environmental laws, including conflict mineral reporting, is estimated to be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a total of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	approximately $750,000 for the three most recently completed fiscal years ending April 30, 2016.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; Additional or modified requirements may be imposed in the future.&nbsp; If such additional or modified requirements are imposed, or if conditions requiring remediation are found to exist, the Company may be required to incur additional expenditures.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Backlog
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company relies on customers&#x2019; forecasted orders and purchase orders (firm orders) from its customers to estimate backlog.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company&#x2019;s backlog of firm orders as of April 30, 2016 and 2015 was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	167
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	290
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and $142,520,000, respectively.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company anticipates a significant portion of the backlog at April 30, 2016 will ship in fiscal year 2017.&nbsp;&nbsp;Because customers may cancel or reschedule deliveries, backlog may not be a meaningful indicator of future revenue.&nbsp;&nbsp;Variations in the magnitude and duration of contracts, forecasts and purchase orders received by the Company and delivery requirements generally may result in substantial fluctuations in backlog from period to period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Employees
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company employed approximately 2,790
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	full-time employees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	as of April 30, 2016, including
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	186
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	engaged in engineering or engineering-related services, 2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	,226
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in manufacturing and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	378
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in administrative and marketing functions.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company has a labor contract with Chemical &amp; Production Workers Union Local No. 30, AFL-CIO, covering the Company&#x2019;s workers in Elk Grove Village, Illinois which expires on December 31, 2018. The Company&#x2019;s Mexican subsidiary, Standard Components de Mexico S.A., has a labor contract with Sindicato De Trabajadores de la Industra Electronica, Similares y Conexos del Estado de Coahuila, C.T.M. covering the Company&#x2019;s workers in Acuna, Mexico
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	which expires on February 1, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company&#x2019;s subsidiary located in Tijuana Mexico has a labor contract with Sindicato Mexico Moderno De Trabajadores De La, Baja California, C.R.O.C.&nbsp;&nbsp;The contract does not have an expiration date.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company&#x2019;s subsidiary located in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, has a labor contract with CONG DOAN CO SO CONG TY TNHH Spitfire Controls Vietnam. The contract expires February 28, 2017.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Since the time the Company commenced operations, it has not experienced any union-related work stoppages.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company believes its relations with both unions and its other employees are good.
</FONT>
</P>

<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:20.96%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;HEIGHT:39.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">

<EFX_RISK_FACTORS>
<A NAME="FIS_RISK_FACTORS"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ITEM 1
</FONT>
<A NAME="SGMA-20160430X10K_HTM_RISK_FACTORS">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	A. RISK FACTORS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The following risk factors should be read carefully in connection with evaluating our business and the forward-looking information contained in this Annual Report on Form 10-K.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any of the following risks could materially adversely affect our business, operations, industry or financial position or our future financial performance.&nbsp;&nbsp;While the Company believes it has identified and discussed below the key risk factors affecting its business, there may be additional risks and uncertainties that are not presently known or that are not currently believed to be significant that may adversely affect its business, operations, industry, financial position and financial performance in the future.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company&#x2019;s ability to secure and maintain sufficient credit arrangements is key to its continued operations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	There is no assurance that the Company will be able to retain or renew its credit agreements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and other finance agreements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in the future.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event the business grows r
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	apidly, the uncertain
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	economic climate continues
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	r the Company considers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	another
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	acquisition, additional financing resources could be necessary in the current or future fiscal years.&nbsp;&nbsp;There is no assurance that the Company will be able to obtain equity or debt financing at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	acceptable terms, or at all
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in the future.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company has a senior secured credit facility with Wells Fargo, N.A. with a credit limit up to $30,000,000.&nbsp;&nbsp;The credit facility is collateralized by substantially all of the domestically located assets of the Company and
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage11"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the Company has pledged 65% of its equity ownership interest in some of its foreign entities.&nbsp;&nbsp;The facility allows the Company to choose among interest rates at which it may borrow funds:&nbsp;&nbsp;the bank fixed rate of two and one quarter percent plus one percent (effectively 3.25% at April 30, 2016) or LIBOR plus two and one quarter percent (effectively 2.875% at April 30, 2016).&nbsp;&nbsp;Interest is paid monthly.&nbsp;&nbsp;Under the senior secured credit facility, the Company may borrow up to the lesser of (i) $30,000,000 or (ii) an amount equal to a percentage of the eligible receivable borrowing base plus a percentage of the inventory borrowing base (collectively, &#x201C;Borrowing Base&#x201D;), which cannot exceed 50% of combined eligible receivables and inventory.&nbsp;&nbsp;In January 2016, the existing senior credit facility was modified, including increasing the amount available under the Borrowing Base calculation and extending the term of the facility through October 31, 2018.&nbsp;&nbsp;The bank fee for the modification was $23,333 and is amortized over the term of the credit facility agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;As of April 30, 2016, there was a $20,014,069 outstanding balance and $3,630,035 of unused availability under the credit facility agreement compared to a $27,416,793 outstanding balance and $2,583,207 of unused availability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	at April 30,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company is required to be in compliance with several financial covenants.&nbsp;&nbsp;At April 30, 2016, the Company was in compliance with its financial covenants.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company anticipates that its credit facilities, cash flow from operations and leasing resources are adequate to meet its working capital requirements and capital expenditures for fiscal year 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	at the Company&#x2019;s current level of business.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company has received forecasts from current customers for increased business that would require additional investment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in inventory. To the extent that these forecasts come to fruition, the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	may need to raise capital from other sources of debt or equity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	engaged an investment banker for the purpose of completing a capital raise during fiscal year 2016 and subsequently terminated that agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company plans to evaluate alternatives for raising capital in fiscal year 2017.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In addition, in the event the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	desires to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	expand its operations, its business grows
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	more
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	rapidly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	than expected
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, the current economic climate deteriorates, customers delay payments, or the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	desires to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	co
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	nsummate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	an acquisition, additional financing resources
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	may
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	be necessary in the current or future fiscal years.&nbsp;&nbsp;There is no assurance that the Company will be able to obtain equity or debt financing at acceptable terms, or at all, in the future.&nbsp;&nbsp;There is no assurance that the Company will be able to retain or renew its credit agreements in the future, or that any retention or renewal will be on the same terms as currently exist.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Adverse changes in the economy or political conditions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	could negatively impact the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Company&#x2019;s business, results of operations and financial condition.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company&#x2019;s sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and gross margins depend significantly on market demand for its customers&#x2019; products.&nbsp;&nbsp;The uncertainty in the U.S. and international economic and political environment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	could result in a decline in demand for our customers&#x2019; products in any industry.&nbsp;&nbsp;Further, any adverse changes in tax rates and laws affecting our customers could result in decreasing gross margins.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any of these factors could negatively impact the Company&#x2019;s business, results of operations and financial condition.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company experiences variable operating results.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company&#x2019;s results of operations have varied and may continue to fluctuate significantly from period to period, including on a quarterly basis.&nbsp;&nbsp;Consequently, results of operations in any period should not be considered indicative of the results for any future period, and fluctuations in operating results may also result in fluctuations in the price of the Company&#x2019;s common stock.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company&#x2019;s quarterly and annual results may vary significantly depending on numerous factors, many of which are beyond the Company&#x2019;s control.&nbsp;&nbsp;Some of these factors include:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	changes in sales mix to customers
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	changes in availability and rising component costs
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	volume of customer orders relative to capacity
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	market demand and acceptance of our customers&#x2019; products
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	price erosion within the EMS marketplace
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	capital equipment requirements needed to remain technologically competitive
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	volatility in the U.S. and international economic
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and financial markets
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">

	&nbsp;

</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company&#x2019;s customer base is concentrated.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	Sales to the Company&#x2019;s five largest customers accounted for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	61.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	and 6

	2

	5

	% of net sales for the fiscal years ended April 30, 201

	9.6

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
